mapper.insert: insert into comments(nickname, content, wdate, good, board_num, report) values(#{nickname},#{content},#{wdate},#{good},#{board_num},#{report})
mapper.update: update comments set nickname=#{nickname},content=#{content} where comments_num=#{comments_num}
mapper.select: select * from comments order by comments_num desc
select * from comments order by comments_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageBlock}
select * from comments where nickname like #{searchWord}
select * from comments where content like #{searchWord}
select count(*) total_rows from comments where nickname like #{searchWord}
select count(*) total_rows from comments where content like #{searchWord}
